fr.zcraft.quartzlib.tools.text

Class ActionBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.zcraft.quartzlib.tools.text.ActionBar

  • public final class ActionBar
extends Object
    An utility class to send action bar messages to the players.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • sendPermanentMessage

        public static void sendPermanentMessage(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                        String message)
        Sends a constant message to the given player.

        This message will remain on the screen until the removeMessage(org.bukkit.entity.Player, boolean) method is called, or the server is stopped.

        Parameters:
        player - The player.
        message - The message to display.

      • sendPermanentMessage

        public static void sendPermanentMessage(UUID playerUuid,
                                        String message)
        Sends a constant message to the given player.

        This message will remain on the screen until the removeMessage(org.bukkit.entity.Player, boolean) method is called, or the server is stopped.

        Parameters:
        playerUuid - The player's UUID.
        message - The message to display.

      • removeMessage

        public static void removeMessage(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                 boolean instant)
        Removes the action bar message displayed to the given player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player.
        instant - If true, the message will be removed instantly. Else, it will dismiss progressively. Please note that in that case, the message may be displayed a few more seconds.

      • removeMessage

        public static void removeMessage(UUID playerUuid,
                                 boolean instant)
        Removes the action bar message displayed to the given player.
        Parameters:
        playerUuid - The UUID of the player.
        instant - If true, the message will be removed instantly. Else, it will dismiss progressively. Please note that in that case, the message may be displayed a few more seconds.

      • removeMessage

        public static void removeMessage(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Removes the action bar message displayed to the given player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player.

      • removeMessage

        public static void removeMessage(UUID playerUuid)
        Removes the action bar message displayed to the given player.
        Parameters:
        playerUuid - The UUID of the player.

      • initActionMessageUpdaterTask

        public static void initActionMessageUpdaterTask()
        Initializes the ActionBar API.

        Initializes the Runnable that will re-send the permanent action messages to the players.
